GrindArea.Name: Kick 'em while They're Down for Maintenance (Bonus)

UserDialog.Title: Kick
UserDialog.Message: This profile cannot currently be used by a Bounty Hunter. You can use it for BH, but it completes 0 class quests for BH's! Feel free to give correctly developed profile syntax and specific places to put said syntax at!

UserDialog.Title: Kick
UserDialog.Message: This profile cannot currently be used by a Warrior. You can use it for Warrior, but it completes 0 class quests for BH's! Feel free to give correctly developed profile syntax and specific places to put said syntax at!
